divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a star like sight. It moved slow in an ascending way out of sight. at steep angle. same as the two i saw the other night. not normal for our area and never seen anything like it. no aircraft I've seen could do what this craft did in the way it did. if it was man made, it was for space and id like to know more about it.
